thread.title: Man Utd news: Manchester United AND Arsenal will miss out on top four – Steven Gerrard | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man Utd news: Manchester United AND Arsenal will miss out on top four – Steven Gerrard | Metro News

author: George Bellshaw For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man Utd news: Manchester United AND Arsenal will miss out on top four – Steven Gerrard | Metro News
text:
George Bellshaw for Metro.co.uk Saturday 11 Feb 2017 8:22 pm Will Wenger and Mourinho miss out? (Picture: Getty) 
Liverpool legend Steven Gerrard believes Manchester United and Arsenal will both miss out on the top four in the Premier League this season. 
The Red Devils cruised to a 2-0 win against Watford, which saw them extend their unbeaten run in the division to 16 games. Mesut Ozil suffering CRISIS of confidence, admits Arsenal boss Wenger 
Arsenal, meanwhile, beat Hull 2-0 to end a run of back-to-back losses to Watford and Chelsea. 
With the title looking out of reach for Tottenham Hotspur, Liverpool, Manchester City, Manchester United and Arsenal, Gerrard offered his prediction as to who will finish in the Champions League spots. Gerrard thinks United have a great chance (Picture: Getty) 
And Gerrard has backed Arsenal and Man United to both miss out. 
‘Arsenal will drop out and United have left themselves too much to do,’ he told BT Sport.
